requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3537u
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 735M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750TI 2GB or AMD R7 260X 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960 4GB or AMD R9 290 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

requirements_en.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: intel x86 family, 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl 2.0 supported graphics card
